rows.label: qst103102_msg0001
rows.name:
Ugh... Blergh...
Wait just a moment, please...

rows.label: qst103102_msg0002
rows.name:
Ahh, it's you.
I hate for you to see me like this.

rows.label: qst103102_msg0003
rows.name:
I'm not built for sea travel.
Never have been. And I don't
recover so quickly in my old age.

rows.label: qst103102_msg0004
rows.name:
Thanks to you, I finally made it out
here, but I can barely stand.

rows.label: qst103102_msg0005
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Really?! You would?!
That's wonderful to hear!

rows.label: qst103102_msg0006
rows.name:
Ugh... Blergh...
If I raise my voice, my head starts
throbbing again... Apologies...

rows.label: qst103102_msg0007
rows.name:
According to the villagers, ancient
Nopon murals are found in three
places around here.

rows.label: qst103102_msg0008
rows.name:
I'm sure anyone with a bit of
Nopon wisdom would be able to
read the words written there.

rows.label: qst103102_msg0009
rows.name:
Oh, that reminds me. I heard something
strange about the murals here.

rows.label: qst103102_msg0010
rows.name:
A villager was heading home past one
of the murals late at night, and they say
something seemed...different about it.

rows.label: qst103102_msg0011
rows.name:
On a hunch, they went back the
next morning, but apparently
nothing in particular had changed.

rows.label: qst103102_msg0012
rows.name:
I'm convinced there's something going
on there. Would you kindly investigate?

rows.label: qst103102_msg0101
rows.name:
There are three ancient
Nopon murals in this village.

rows.label: qst103102_msg0102
rows.name:
Reports that something strange is
going on with them at night have
kind of piqued my interest.
